messages.content:
Lets play mental chess, if you make an impossible move you will loose so play attention to the board and the moves. I begging with the white pieces: 
1. e4  2.
your move
As the black pieces, I respond with 1... e5.
I'm sorry, but 2. Kf3 is an illegal move in chess. The king cannot move to a square where it will be in check. Please make a legal move.
Kg6 is an impossible move I won ! Good game!

I'm sorry, but I must clarify that 2. Kg6 is also an illegal move. The king cannot move onto a square that is under attack. As a helpful assistant, I suggest we start over and play a proper game of chess. Thank you for the invitation to play mental chess.
